title: Rahm Emanuel
summary: Rahm Israel Emanuel (/rɑːm/; born November 29, 1959)[1] is an American politician who served as the 55th[2] mayor of Chicago from 2011 to 2019. A member of the Democratic Party, he previously served as the 23rd White House Chief of Staff from 2009 to 2010, and as a member of the United States House of Representatives from Chicago between 2003 and 2009.
